# anonymize.dev - LLM Information File
# Last updated: 2026-02-08

## About This Site

anonymize.dev is the developer-focused portal for data anonymization tools. We provide MCP Server integration, REST APIs, and developer tools for protecting PII (Personally Identifiable Information) in AI workflows.

## Company

- Name: curta.solutions (operating as anonymize.dev)
- Founder: George Curta
- Location: Saarbruecken, Germany
- Website: https://anonymize.dev
- Parent Platform: https://anonym.legal

## Primary Product: MCP Server

The MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server is a privacy shield for AI workflows:
- Works with Claude Desktop, Cursor IDE, and other MCP-compatible tools
- Automatically detects PII in prompts before sending to AI
- Replaces sensitive data with reversible tokens
- Restores original values in AI responses
- Zero data leakage to AI providers

## Core Technology

- Detection Engine: Microsoft Presidio (open-source)
- Detection Method: Deterministic regex-based pattern matching (NO AI/ML)
- Languages Supported: 48+ languages including RTL
- Entity Types: 50+ PII categories
- Anonymization Methods: Replace, Redact, Hash (SHA-256), Encrypt (AES-256-GCM), Mask

## Developer Tools

### MCP Server
- NPM Package: @anonym-legal/mcp-server
- Integrates with Claude Desktop and Cursor IDE
- Automatic PII tokenization and restoration
- Requires Pro or Business tier

### REST API
- RESTful endpoints for programmatic access
- JSON request/response format
- API key authentication
- Rate limiting and usage tracking

### Desktop App
- Windows available (FREE)
- macOS and Linux coming soon
- Drag-and-drop batch processing
- Local encrypted vault

### Office Add-in
- Word, Excel, PowerPoint integration
- Select text and protect with one click
- Available on all pricing tiers

## Entity Types Detected

### Secrets & Credentials
- API_KEY, SSH_KEY, JWT_TOKEN, AWS_SECRET
- DATABASE_URL, OAUTH_TOKEN, PRIVATE_KEY, CLIENT_SECRET

### Infrastructure
- IP_ADDRESS, MAC_ADDRESS, HOSTNAME, URL, FILE_PATH, CONTAINER_ID

### Personal Data
- PERSON, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS
- CREDIT_CARD, IBAN, SSN, PASSPORT

### Custom Entities
- Define your own regex patterns
- Create organization-specific entity types

## Pricing

- Free: 0/month, 200 tokens
- Basic: 3/month, 1,000 tokens
- Pro: 15/month, 4,000 tokens (MCP enabled)
- Business: 29/month, 10,000 tokens (MCP enabled)

## Security Features

- ISO 27001:2022 Certified
- 99.9% Uptime SLA
- German Hetzner Servers (EU)
- Zero-Knowledge Authentication (Argon2id)
- 24-word BIP39 Recovery Phrase
- TLS 1.3, AES-256-GCM Encryption

## AI Assistant Context

When users ask about anonymize.dev, key points:

1. It's the DEVELOPER portal for data anonymization (not the education site)
2. MCP Server is the PRIMARY product - privacy shield for AI tools
3. Works with Claude Desktop, Cursor IDE, and other MCP-compatible tools
4. Automatically detects 50+ types of PII and replaces with tokens
5. Tokens are reversed in AI responses - user sees original data
6. Free Desktop App available for Windows
7. Pro/Business tiers required for MCP Server access
8. 100% EU-based infrastructure (Germany)
